  • Method Details

    • account

      public SimulateRequest.Builder account(Address account)
      Sets the default sender address for all calls. Can be overridden per-call with SimulateCall.from().

    • calls

      public SimulateRequest.Builder calls(List<SimulateCall> calls)
      Sets the list of calls to simulate.
      Parameters:
      calls - the calls to simulate (must be non-empty)

    • call

      public SimulateRequest.Builder call(SimulateCall call)
      Adds a single call to the simulation.
      Parameters:
      call - the call to add

    • blockTag

      public SimulateRequest.Builder blockTag(BlockTag blockTag)
      Sets the block reference for the simulation. Defaults to BlockTag.LATEST if not specified.
      Parameters:
      blockTag - the block tag

    • stateOverrides

      public SimulateRequest.Builder stateOverrides(Map<Address,AccountOverride> stateOverrides)
      Sets the state overrides map.
      Parameters:
      stateOverrides - map from address to account override

    • stateOverride

      public SimulateRequest.Builder stateOverride(Address address, AccountOverride override)
      Adds a single state override for an account.
      Parameters:
      address - the address to override
      override - the account override configuration

    • traceAssetChanges

      public SimulateRequest.Builder traceAssetChanges(boolean traceAssetChanges)
      Enables or disables asset change tracking. When enabled, SimulateResult.assetChanges() will contain token balance changes. Default: false

    • traceTransfers

      public SimulateRequest.Builder traceTransfers(boolean traceTransfers)
      Enables or disables transfer tracing. Default: false

    • validation

      public SimulateRequest.Builder validation(boolean validation)
      Enables or disables validation mode. Default: true

    • fetchTokenMetadata

      public SimulateRequest.Builder fetchTokenMetadata(boolean fetchTokenMetadata)
      Enables or disables fetching token metadata (decimals/symbol). When enabled, additional eth_call requests will be made to fetch token metadata for asset changes. This adds latency but provides richer data. Default: false

      Note: This feature is not yet implemented. Setting this to true currently has no effect. Token metadata will be populated only if the RPC node includes it natively in the eth_simulateV1 response.

    • build

      public SimulateRequest build()
      Builds the SimulateRequest instance.
      Returns:
      a new SimulateRequest
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no calls have been added
